name: Superman
description: Faster than a speeding bullet, more powerful than a locomotive… Rocketed to Earth as an infant from the doomed planet Krypton, Kal-El was adopted by the loving Kent family and raised in America´s heartland as Clark Kent. Using his immense solar-fueled powers, he became Superman to defend mankind against all manner of threats while championing truth, justice and freedom.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Superman was created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster. First appearance in Action Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: superman - the film
events.description: Directed by Richard Donner and starred by Christopher Reeve, it was the first superhero blockbuster

events.title: the arcade game
events.description: Released by Taito in 1988, this arcade beat ’em up/shoot ’em up was incredible successful at its time

events.title: the death of superman
events.description: Crossover story which contains one of the most relevant events across all the character history

events.title: man of steel - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zack Snyder and starred by Henry Cavill, it was the highest-grossing solo Superman film of all time

name: Batman
description: Bruce Wayne, who witnessed the murder of his billionaire parents as a child, swore to avenge their deaths. He trained extensively to achieve mental and physical perfection, mastering martial arts, detective skills, and criminal psychology. Costumed as a bat to prey on the fears of criminals, and utilizing a high-tech arsenal, he became the legendary dark night of Gotham.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Batman was created by Bob Kane y Bill Finger. First appearance in Detective Comics #27

events.title: robin creation
events.description: Robin was introduced as a junior crime-fighting partner for Batman in Detective Comics #38

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: the dark night returns
events.description: It is widely considered to be one of the greatest and most influential Batman stories ever made

events.title: batman - the film
events.description: Directed by Tim Burton and starred by Michael Keaton, it was the first hero appearance on the big screens

events.title: arkham asylum - the game
events.description: The beginning of a relevant franchise, it was called one of the best comic book superhero games ever made

name: WonderWoman
description: Armed with superpowers of a god, Wonder Woman is one of Earth´s most powerful defenders of peace, justice, and equality in addition to be a member of the Justice League. Her original origin allegorically depicted her as a clay figure brought to life by the gods, but in recent years she has been depicted more literally as the daughter of Zeus and the Amazon queen Hippolyta.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Wonderwoman was created by William M. Marston and Harry G. Peter. First appearance in Sensation Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: wonder woman - the series
events.description: Starred by Kinda Carter, this portrayal of the character strongly influenced the Wonder Woman comics

events.title: gods and mortals
events.description: Run by George Perez, it is widely considered the greatest run of the character in comic book history

events.title: wonder woman - the movie
events.description: Directed by Patty Jenkins and starred by Gal Gadot, it received a very positive response from critics

events.title: the official game
events.description: A single-player open-world action game which is the first videogame starring the Amazonian warrior

name: TheFlash
description: Having discovered his mother murdered and his father blamed for the act, forensic scientist Barry Allen sought conscientiously to clear his father´s alias and find the real killer. After being doused in chemicals and struck by lightning, Barry was granted the gift of super-speed. Nowadays he protects his hometown of Central City as The Flash, the scarlet speedster.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Flash was created by Gardner Fox and Harry Lampert. First appearance in Flash Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: the flash - nineties series
events.description: Starred by John Wesley Shipp, this series was plenty of weird sci-fi villains and blockbuster special effects

events.title: flashpoint
events.description: Perhaps the most iconic of all modern timelines involving the Flash, it implied a reboot of the character

events.title: the flash - the series
events.description: Starred by Grant Gustin, it was composed of 8 seasons within fictional universe known the Arrowverse

events.title: justice league - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zach Snyder, this film supposed the first appearance of the character in the big screens

name: GreenLantern
description: Gifted with the ability to overcome great fear and harness the power of will, test-pilot Hal Jordan was chosen to be the Green Lantern of Sector 2814 inheriting the ring of the dying alien Green Lantern, Abin Sur. Through sheer will power and determination, Hal has established an impressive record of heroism and brave performances across the galaxy with the help of his fellow Green Lanterns.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Greenlantern was created by Mart Nodell and Bill Finger. First appearance in All-American Comics #16

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: Emerald Twilight
events.description: This iconic storyline changed the super hero forever by shaking up the status quo for the character

events.title: Sinestro Corps War
events.description: Ranked among the top comic books of the year, the fan reception of this crossover was highly positive

events.title: green lantern - the movie
events.description: Directed by Martin Campbell and starred by Ryan Reynolds, the film receive negative reviews overall

events.title: green lantern - the action game
events.description: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters is an enjoyable and predictable beat-'em-up action game

name: Aquaman
alias: The king of the seven seas
description: The son of an Atlantean queen and a lighthouse keeper from the town of Amnesty Bay, Arthur Curry would grow up to become the powerful superhero Aquaman, and later take on his birthright as the King of Atlantis. He is the bridge between the surface world and his tumultuous realm of the sea in addition to being an important founding member of the Justice League.

events.title: character creation
events.description: Superman was created by Jerry Siegel and JoeShuster. First appearance in Action Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: One of the founders of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.description: Directed by Zack Snyder and starred by Henry Cavill, it was the highest-grossing solo Superman film of all time

name: GreenArrow
description: Oliver Jonas 'Ollie' Queen was a spoiled, thrill-seeking playboy, until he was left stranded on a deserted island for several years. There, he trained tirelessly to become the both, a master archer and a powerful fighter, in order to survive. After his return home, he used his new-found skills, his wealth and his will to became the costumed vigilante known as Green Arrow.

events.description: Superman was created by Jerry Siegel and JoeShuster. First appearance in Action Comics #1

name: Cyborg
description: Half man, half machine - all hero! After a near fatal incident, Victor Stone was cybernetically enhanced by his father. He now possesses the ability to communicate, manipulate, and interface with nearly all forms of technology. As he is constantly upgrading, he promises to defend the future from any threat. Furthermore, he is a founding member of the Justice League.

events.description: Superman was created by Jerry Siegel and JoeShuster. First appearance in Action Comics #1
